relatedMaps.name: Dam Battlegrounds
relatedMaps.description: Alcantara Power Plant, or "The Dam", stands as a silent sentinel amidst a toxic, waterlogged land, nourishing a riot of resilient vegitation and fauna. A monument echoing with the memories of power once generated.

relatedMaps.name: The Spaceport
relatedMaps.description: Acerra Spaceport is a majestic testament to humanity's past ambitions. This is where the Exodus shuttles, vessels of hope and desperation, once roared into the heavens, leaving a beleaguered Earth behind.

relatedMaps.name: Dam Battlegrounds
relatedMaps.description: Alcantara Power Plant, or "The Dam", stands as a silent sentinel amidst a toxic, waterlogged land, nourishing a riot of resilient vegitation and fauna. A monument echoing with the memories of power once generated.

relatedMaps.name: Buried City
relatedMaps.description: Amidst the sand dunes in this arid wasteland you will find a remnant of the old world quite unlike the cold steel spires of the Exodus age. Walk these narrow streets and empty plazas, and know that people once lived here.
